title: Festival of family classics.- Volume 1.
brief_description: Introduced by Chelsea Brown this tape includes 3 stories. “Cinderella”; the classic story with the inclusion of a bumbling knight and an absentminded godmother makes this story an hilariously funny one; “A Christmas tree”; based on the Charles Dickens story this tale is about Peter and Mary, two children out to recover the spirit of Christmas; “Robin Hood”; Robin Hood is captured by the mean sheriff of Nottingham.
